summary: I am a proactive B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering student at YCCE, Nagpur, stands out with proficiency in MERN stack, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Data Structures and Algorithms, exploring the endless possibilities of technology in the domain of Computer Science.
about: Mehul Kohad, a proactive B.Tech CSE student at YCCE, stands out with his proficiency in web development and mastering the MERN stack. Originating from Nagpur, his upbringing in the city has uniquely influenced his viewpoint. He demonstrates an unwavering commitment to staying updated with emerging technologies, particularly in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and honing his skills in Data Structures and Algorithms.

Renowned for his dedication to lifelong learning, Mehul aspires to make significant contributions in the constantly evolving tech landscape. With his focus on innovation and a solid technological foundation, Mehul Kohad is set for a promising journey in the field of computer science.

Apart from his academic pursuits, Mehul enjoys delving into the complexities of Data Structures and Algorithms in his spare time. Additionally, as an enthusiast of cricket, he actively participates in and enjoys watching matches, drawing inspiration from the sport's blend of teamwork and strategic planning. Music serves as his refuge during free time, providing both comfort and a creative outlet.
